title: Famous movie star seen using a OnePlus Open
description: It doesn't appear this person has ever used a foldable before, so we think OnePlus staged this situation.

title: Score a chance to get the Sony HTX8500 soundbar at an insane $200 off
description: If you're lucky enough to be chosen, you'll get the high-end soundbar at a record-low price of just $198.

title: End of an Era: Netflix announces it shipped its last DVD today
description: The company cites dwindling revenue as the reason for its shut down.

title: Pixel Watch 2 leak shows off Fitbit features with UI redesign
description: The Fitbit experience is getting an upgrade on the Pixel Watch 2.

title: These Pixel 8 and Pixel Watch 2 leaks tell us everything about the products
description: We've lost track of how many times these devices have leaked in the past few days, but now we have our cleanest look at them.

title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra renders leak: Are flat displays back in fashion?
description: These early renders indicate that the Galaxy S24 Ultra could have a flat or near-flat display, UWB, and other familiar bits.

title: Discord is down, and affected users are seeing a “blocked” message
description: Affected users are getting a "Sorry, you have been blocked" message, and those able to log in cannot see their messages.

title: What does Nudge mean on TikTok?
description: There's a unique way to interact with others on TikTok.

title: Apple remains silent on iPhone 15 Pro’s heating issue despite mounting evidence
description: Plenty of reviewers and users have complained about the inexplicable heating issue, but Apple has remained mum so far.

title: What are silicon anode batteries?
description: Silicon anode batteries may be changing the game for battery technology.

title: It’s only September but we’ve already got our first look at the Galaxy S24
description: The upcoming phone could pack flat, polished edges and UWB support.

title: An abandoned Apple-Microsoft deal is now making trouble for Google
description: Microsoft reportedly tried selling Bing to Apple. The deal would have booted Google Search out of iPhones.

title: The 18 best Android games
description: Android games have come a long way and there's a lot to choose from. Here are the best Android games currently available.
